description: Stops the specified WorkSpaces. You cannot stop a WorkSpace unless it has a running mode of AutoStop or Manual and a state of AVAILABLE, IMPAIRED, UNHEALTHY, or ERROR.

parameters.name: StopWorkspaceRequests
parameters.description: The WorkSpaces to stop. You can specify up to 25 WorkSpaces. (dict) --- Describes the information used to stop a WorkSpace. WorkspaceId (string) --- The identifier of the WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: FailedRequests
nested_items.description: Information about the WorkSpaces that could not be stopped.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The error code that is returned if the WorkSpace cannot be rebooted.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: The text of the error message that is returned if the WorkSpace cannot be rebooted.
